product_name: Total Home Pest Large Protection Plan
description:
Keep pests and harsh pesticides out of your home

Your home should be a no-go zone for pantry pests, spiders, flies, and other common pests—but you don’t want shady pesticides getting in either.

Our comprehensive yearly subscription includes a one-two pest punch of outdoor barrier protection and indoor spot treatments, both made with botanically derived ingredients. You get a full season of protection, plus a personalized checklist that tells you how to use your products, when to apply them, and more.

sections.standard_annual_plan_highlights:
It’s powerful: Our barrier spray and spot treatment kill on contact, yet are made with botanically derived pyrethrin and canola oil.
It’s customized: Get a personal checklist that tells you how and when to use your products, plus helpful preventive tips.
It’s comprehensive: One annual box includes easy-to-use products that work together to kill dozens of bugs throughout the season.
It’s a better value: Save 18% when you buy as a plan, shipped in one box.

sections.bugs_controlled:
Our standard plan includes roughly 5-6 months* of protection and automatically renewals annually. Want to find your ideal plan size and discover additional ways to protect your home? Take our quiz!
*Varies based on your climate, level of infestation, home perimeter, and size of indoor areas to protect.
Additional product instructions for this plan: Bug Doom Home Insect Control instructions Bug Doom Indoor Insect Control instructions
sections.faq:
How do annual plans work?
Sunday’s Total Home Protection Plan is a holistic pest management solution for indoor pest control and reduction, and it includes both barrier and spot treatments. Your plan arrives in one simple shipment that renews annually. You’ll also get a personalized checklist with optimal application timing and seasonal prevention actions designed for your home. When combined, this comprehensive approach can effectively reduce indoor and overwintering pest presence around and inside your home.
How should I apply my products?
Follow your custom My Plan Checklist (located on your account page) for Bug Doom application dates, product instructions, and seasonal pest prevention actions.
Applications should be based on the type of pests you are treating. To reduce moisture pests and pests trying to enter the home, apply barrier treatments to the perimeter of home structures. For indoor and overwintering pests, spot treat pests directly, as well as entry points to home.
What bugs does it control?
Bug Doom controls ants (excluding fire ants, harvester ants, Pharaoh ants, and carpenter ants), bed bugs, beetles, boxelder bugs, carpet beetles, caterpillars, centipedes, clothes moths, American cockroaches, crickets, darkling beetles, dermestids, earwigs, Elm leaf beetles, firebrats, hide beetles, house flies, kudzu bugs, leather beetles, non-biting midges, millipedes, moths, multicolored Asian lady beetles, pantry pests, pillbugs, silverfish, sowbugs, spiders (excluding black widow, brown recluse, and hobo spiders), and stink bugs (including brown marmorated stink bugs).
How do I use it alongside a Sunday lawn plan?
Ideally, apply all lawn products before pest control products and allow for drying time in between applications. Always allow pest control to dry for a few hours before doing anything else to the lawn to avoid interfering with the product’s ability to repel properly.
How long will it last?
Sunday’s Total Home Protection Plan is an entire year’s worth of pest control and protection from indoor and overwintering pests.
Bug Doom applications will be effective for up to 2-4 weeks depending on your application area (effective longer in shade and areas not exposed to sunlight).
What products are in my plan?
Bug Doom Home Insect Control is an outdoor barrier and spot treatment spray made from active ingredients pyrethrin (0.3%) and canola oil (1.0%) to repel and kill a variety of pests including ants, beetles, spiders, centipedes, house flies, and more. It comes in a 1-gallon (128 fl. oz.) container with a wand applicator attachment.
Bug Doom Home Insect Control is an indoor spot treatment and prevention spray derived from pyrethrin (0.3%) and canola oil (1.0%) to repel and kill a variety of indoor home and overwintering pests including ants, cockroaches, stink bugs, spiders, beetles, centipedes, moths, crickets, and more. It comes in a 32-oz. ready-to-use spray bottle.
What safety precautions should I follow?
Do not apply directly to plants or blooming flowers, especially while bees are active, or near drains, rivers, lakes, streams, or other bodies of water.
Do not apply more than 29 fl. oz of Bug Doom products per 100 sq. ft.
What states are restricted?
This product is approved for all US states.
